channel.title: VTX:UHR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Swatch Profit Plunges as China Weakness Continues to Bite
item.description: Swatch Group AG reported another six months of falling sales and profit, hit hard by sluggish demand for luxury timepieces in China. Shares tumbled.
